Package userLogin

Interface userLogin

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserLoginServices
public interface userLogin
The userLogin interface defines the contract for a user authentication and management system. Implementations of this interface provide methods for user login, logout, registration, password management, and role retrieval.

This interface is intended for managing user access, ensuring secure handling of credentials and roles within an application.

Example usage: 

     userLogin loginSystem = new SomeLoginSystemImplementation();
     loginSystem.register("user1", "password123", "admin");
     boolean success = loginSystem.login("user1", "password123");
Since:
2024-11-6
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tan Guang Wei

  • Method Details

    • login

      boolean login(String username, String password)
      Authenticates a user based on their username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user attempting to log in.
      password - The password associated with the username.
      Returns:
      true if the login is successful; false otherwise.

    • logout

      boolean logout()
      Logs out the current user and ends their session.
      Returns:
      true if the logout was successful; false otherwise.

    • register

      boolean register(String username, String password, String role)
      Registers a new user with the specified username, password, and role.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user to be registered.
      password - The password for the new user.
      role - The role of the new user (e.g., "admin", "user").
      Returns:
      true if the registration is successful; false otherwise.

    • changePassword

      boolean changePassword(String username, String password)
      Changes the password for a given user.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user whose password is to be changed.
      password - The new password for the user.
      Returns:
      true if the password change was successful; false otherwise.

    • resetPassword

      boolean resetPassword(String username)
      Resets the password for a user, typically initiated if the user forgot their password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the user whose password is to be reset.
      Returns:
      true if the password reset request was successful; false otherwise.

    • getRole

      String getRole()
      Retrieves the role of the currently logged-in user.
      Returns:
      The role of the logged-in user (e.g., "admin", "user"). Returns null if no user is currently logged in.
